ygData.subject: Concurrent Jobs?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to crawl multiple sites at the same time. I read the previous post that I could achive it by running multiple instances of Heritrix. So here is

Hi,

I am trying to crawl multiple sites at the same time.

I read the prev=
ious post that I could achive it by running multiple
instances of Heritrix.=


So here is what I found:
- If I start an instance w/web interface, and th=
en I start a job. 
While the job is crawling a site, I go to setup tab and =
create another
instance, when I click on the instance, there is a NullPoint=
erException.
- If start an instance w/web interface, and then I start a job=
, and
then pause it.  When I start another Heritrix instance via the web
in=
terface, it kills the job I paused.

Probably I am not doing the right thin=
g.  Anyone can guide me through?

Thanks in advance.

- H
